title: Negative AS shock increases PL, unemployment

content.prompt: A negative aggregate supply shock will result in which of the following in the short run?

choices.label: An increase in the price level and a decrease in the unemployment rate
A decrease in the price level and an increase in the unemployment rate
A decrease in both the price level and real output
An increase in both the price level and real output
An increase in both the price level and the unemployment rate

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
